### ğŸ§¹ Cleanup Checklist (Required)

**Code Quality:**
- [ ] Removed unused/dead code
- [ ] No commented-out code blocks
- [ ] No console.log statements in production code
- [ ] No TODO comments older than 2 weeks
- [ ] Deleted at least as much code as added

**Dependencies:**
- [ ] Audited new dependencies against whitelist
- [ ] Removed unused dependencies
- [ ] All dependencies pass security audit

**Structure:**
- [ ] No forbidden folders created (archive/, temp/, backup/, old/, misc/, legacy/)
- [ ] No nested README.md files
- [ ] No duplicate configuration files
- [ ] All files under 500KB limit

**Documentation:**
- [ ] Updated existing single-source-of-truth docs
- [ ] No new documentation files created
- [ ] Environment variables documented in .env.example

### ğŸ§ª Testing

- [ ] All integration tests pass
